name: Hustle
description:
Bop your way through them lasers and claim your prize

Be sure not to miss a key or its back to square one

Key sequence is 224 inputs long and is the same every time / No RNG

Once you begin the sequence you have a few seconds to hit the next key or level resets

High Score only posts if you complete the level

Shortcuts

Escape - Main Menu / Exit

Space - Start Game

Enter - Commit Name
